items.name: Labour + Time

items.description: Mockup sketches, 3D models, CAD designs, and source materials for the enclosure, create and test three prototypes

items.name: NFT for Noggles Keychain
items.description: Design a 3D Animated NFT for purchase via crypto, can be redeemed for the DAO

items.name: TikTok / Instagram Videos
items.description: Filming, editing, and post-production of videos showing the making of the Noggles LED Keychain

description: Proposal to fund the development and production of 600 Artisanal Noggles LED keychains, including custom circuit design, enclosure, packaging, and firmware. The project aims to introduce Nouns to hardware enthusiasts and creative engineers, with a strong focus on open-source content and collaboration. The proposal includes a breakdown of costs, a roadmap of development stages, and deliverables.

project.name: Noggles LED Keychain Project
project.description: The Noggles LED Keychain project aims to create a low-cost, unique piece of hardware that serves as a daily-carry item and represents the Nouns identity. It will be open-source, hackable, and available for purchase with crypto or card payment.

title: Open Source Nounish Hardware + Production
